help: List of emergency messages to inject into the simulation
type: one of ADVICE, WATCH_AND_ACT, EVACUATE_NOW
broadcastHHMM : the time in HHMM format when this message is to be sent
broadcastZones: list of zones IDs to which this message should be sent

messages.content: Colac,731000,5756000,Evacuate now if safe to do so
Geelong,794000,5770000,Evacuate now if safe to do so
